description:
Mostly works very well, but some operations can make it crash when using Wayland. To work around this you can force it to use xwayland instead of wayland directly.

This can be done by adding the following environment variable in Flatseal:

   QT_QPA_PLATFORM=xcb
summary: Very good but can crash on Fedora+Wayland

description: Ayant démaré dans le passé 2 ou 3 developements de jeux videos (non publiés), Tiled est un très bon outil. Le standard TMX fonctionne très bien pour la création de jeux un peu rétro.
software good but use official appimage as this flatpak is outdated
summary: software good but use official appimage as this flatpak is outdated
